name: Flintfox International
description:
Flintfox develops Trade Revenue Management (TRM) software that integrates with any ERP.
We have over 30 years of experience delivering solutions for pricing, rebates and accruals across supply chains, with a focus on manufacturing, wholesale distribution and retail industries.
We also offer implementation, managed, and technical services for Microsoft Dynamics 365, AX, and NAV. Our solutions provide our clients with a competitive advantage, enabling them to be more competitive, flexible and profitable.
